titleStmt.title: By the King a proclamation for freedom of passage out of Ireland into England.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most Excellent Majesty: And by the Assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: "Given at Our Court at Whitehall the eighteenth day of November, in the sixteenth yeer of His Majesties Reign."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.

person.persName: the Kings most Excellent Majesty: And
